it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.position

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.position.Position
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CouncilPosition, MarketPosition, TowerPosition, YieldAndProductPosition

    public abstract class Position
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the abstract class for the position, familiar will be set by the game logic when necessary. A Position has a Type that represent the kind of Action that can be performed while in it; a position bonus that is activated when a Familiar is placed in it; a malus that is subtracted to the familiar level when a special situation occurs; a level that represent the least value of the action that can be performed on it.
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

    • Constructor Detail

      • Position

        public Position()
        Default Constructor that sets the Position Logger

      • Position

        public Position(ActionType type,
                int level,
                Obtain bonus,
                int malus)
        Constructor for a general Position
        Parameters:
        type - the action that can be performed on the Position
        level - the level required to place the Familiar
        bonus - the bonus obtained when a familiar is placed
        malus - the malus payed by the Player when there is another familiar of the same player or another player familiar in the same type of position

      • canStay

        protected boolean canStay(Familiar familiar)
        Method used to check if the Familiar satisfy the level requisites
        Parameters:
        familiar - the Familiar to check
        Returns:
        true if the Familiar values minus the malus and the Position level is positive
